order_item_number.description: The identifier of the order item.

order_item_status.description: The current status of the order item.choices:OrderCancelled,OrderDelivered,OrderInTransit,OrderPaymentDue,OrderPickupAvailable,OrderProblem,OrderProcessing,OrderReturned

order_item_quantity.description: The number of the item ordered. If the property is not set, assume the quantity is one.
